flags.-l: Gives a detailed description including permisions

flags.<directory name>: Opens the named directory inside your current directory.
flags.-: Opens the last directory you had open.

flags.*: Will remove all the files in the current directory.
flags.-r: The recursive flag is needed to remove directorys and the files inside.
flags.<filename>.*: Will remove all matching filename patterns ie. <filename>.css and <filename>.js.

cat.description: Lists the files contents in the terminal.

less.description: Lists the files contents on screen but prompts you to scroll through the file one screen at a time.
